lines.text: Beatriz: My name is Beatriz. I mean no harm, I only wish to pass the forest. Who am I speaking to?
Busgosu: The villagers know me as the horned devil, but my true name is Busgosu and I am the guardian of Pontigon forest.
Busgosu: I protect all that grows here and while the monster hiding in the mountain cave remains a threat to my forest, I will not allow anyone to pass.
Beatriz: My quest leads past the forest. Is there anything I can offer you in exchange for granting me safe passage?
Busgosu: A small creature have seen fit to disturb the forest with their mischief. If you fix what they broke, I will allow you to pass.
You need to have completed at least 3 trasgu puzzles to continue forward.
